A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am in my 50's and I love anything in 3D. I would never of seen this movie in regular format. Over an hour too long. There are so many times the last 1 hour\, it seemed the movie was finally over but instead it went on and on and on and on and on. Bad acting and very predictable but the scenes in 3D very good. Save your money.
